explains: v. 选举；选择（做）；（上帝）挑选（某人）（而使其灵魂永远得救）
adj. 候任的；选中的，卓越的；蒙上帝挑选（而得救）的
n. 上帝的选民（the elect）；特权阶层
wordGroup: president elect 当选总统（尚未就职的）

sentences.en: The committee voted to re-elect him (as) chairman.
sentences.cn: 委员会投票再次选举他担任主席。

sentences.en: Councils should be answerable to the people who elect them.
sentences.cn: 委员会应对选出他们的那些人作出交代。

sentences.en: Increasing numbers of people elect to work from home nowadays.
sentences.cn: 现在越来越多的人选择在家上班。
